sentences.en: Asked what she meant, she said mysteriously: "Work it out for yourself".
sentences.cn: 问她是什么意思，她故弄玄虚地说：“你自己想吧。”

sentences.en: Come and warm yourselves by the fire.
Do not have a drink or take drugs to calm yourself down.
sentences.cn: 不要用喝酒或吸毒的方式让自己镇静下来。

sentences.en: Don't let yourself despair; this will only make matters worse.
sentences.cn: 不要想不开，这样只能使情况变得更糟。

sentences.en: Give yourself a healthy glow on our detox diet.
sentences.cn: 我们的解毒食谱将会让您容光焕发。

sentences.en: Go and buy yourself an ice cream.
sentences.cn: 去给你自己买个冰激凌吧。

sentences.en: I think you're a bit too high and mighty yourself.
sentences.cn: 我认为你自己就有些过于盛气凌人。

sentences.en: In working with others, you find out more about yourself.
sentences.cn: 在与别人一起工作的过程中，你会进一步认识你自己。

sentences.en: It's enough to make you wet yourself, if you'll pardon the expression.
sentences.cn: 这足以吓得你尿裤子了，请原谅我这么说。

sentences.en: Look at yourself in the mirror.
Now sit down and make yourself comfortable. You must be very tired.
sentences.cn: 现在坐下来，让自己舒服些，你一定很累了。

sentences.en: Take a well-earned rest and go out and enjoy yourself.
sentences.cn: 你理应休息一下，出去好好玩玩。

sentences.en: Take the opportunity to plunge yourself into your career.
sentences.cn: 抓住机会投身到事业中去。

sentences.en: The secret to happiness is to keep setting yourself new challenges.
sentences.cn: 幸福的秘诀就是要不停地给自己设定新的挑战。

sentences.en: You begin to ask yourself what kind of person perpetrated this crime.
sentences.cn: 你开始自问是什么样的人犯下这样的罪行。

sentences.en: You flatter yourself. Why would we go to such ludicrous lengths?
sentences.cn: 你真自以为是。我们为什么要费那么大的力气？

sentences.en: You may see yourself as useless, incompetent and blameworthy.
sentences.cn: 你也许会认为自己无用、不称职、应该受到指责。

sentences.en: You would have to dig up the plant yourself.
sentences.cn: 你得自己把那株植物挖出来。

phrases.tran_cn: 见 be 条 be oneself, not be oneself
(非正式)你也好吗？（尤在回答对方同样询问后使用）

trans.tran_en: used when talking to someone to show that they are affected by their own action
